original: 司隸京兆人，杜預從兄。頗有才望，八王之亂時任黃門侍郎，司馬倫誅殺賈南風，杜斌等無端遭到牽連，被誤殺。
text: Si Li Jingzhao people, Du Yucong brother. Quite talented, during the Rebellion of the Eight Kings, he served as the servant of the Huangmen, Sima Lun killed Jananfeng, and Du Bin was implicated for no reason and was killed by mistake.
